definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Car fans always post this kind of articles.
My little brother always forgets to wash behind his ears.
sentences.chinese: 我的小弟弟老是忘記洗耳後根。

sentences.english: Those busybodies always seemed to have some-thing to gossip about.
sentences.chinese: 薩拉是個好管閒事的人，老是打聽別人的事。

sentences.english: Often appear these days giddy and disgusting, this kind of symptom is discontinuity .
sentences.chinese: 最近幾天老是出現頭暈噁心，這種症狀是間斷性的。

sentences.english: Father told him not to always ask the whys and wherefores when he was told to do something.
sentences.chinese: 父親告訴他叫他做事情時不要老是問三問四。

sentences.english: In his view, people spend far too much time putting the cart before the horse.
sentences.chinese: 在他來看，人們老是本末倒置。

sentences.english: Here the local were always barbered at this hour on this day.
sentences.chinese: 原來本地人老是在這一天這個時候這個地方理髮。

sentences.english: Some clubs are always dunning their members for contribution.
sentences.chinese: 某些俱樂部老是向其成員催繳捐款。

sentences.english: The two sisters always quarrels like cat and dog.
sentences.chinese: 她們姐妹倆在一起就雞犬不寧，老是吵架。

sentences.english: Sorry to is so disobliging, but I have no money to lend you.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要老是談這個話題。

sentences.english: She can't get rid of the cold.
What can he mean by being so tiresome as to be always coming here?
sentences.chinese: 他爲什麼那樣不知趣，老是要上這兒來？

sentences.english: Tactuality is a abstruseary in my appointment who tries to do as little as feasible.
sentences.chinese: 我辦公室裏的一個祕書老是想法幹得越少越好。

sentences.english: People will not believe a man who always exaggerates.
sentences.chinese: 人們不會相信老是誇大其詞的人。

sentences.english: The micro wave oven makes a continuous buzzing noise.
sentences.chinese: 微波爐老是發出滋滋聲。

definition: lit. twice every three days (idiom); practically every day/frequently
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
